body.name: VOTNTUT USB Computer Speakers for Desktop Monitor,Desktop Speakers with Loud Sound, Volume Control and Mute Button for Windows,Linux,Mac Air/Pro(USB-C to USB Adapter Included) (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 36 mins
features: 【Loud&Rich Bass】Our Laptop speakers are built with extra-large 3-inch Rubber ring horn which ensures that the usb speaker produces surprisingly loud and heavy bass in a limited cavity.The golden 30-degree design of the hearing allows music to reach your ears directly, avoiding the loss of music to the maximum extent.Please note that due to the limitations of the cavity, our sound cannot be compared to some speakers with subwoofers in terms of bass

【Plug and Play】Our desktop speakers are built with the latest decoder chips for 99% of the computer systems on the market like Windows7/8/8.1/10,Linux,Mac Air/pro, enabling plug and play.Forget 3.5mm Aux cord today.The oval appearance and single USB design can save the space of your desktop to the greatest extent, making it simple and succinct

【Multi-Functional Buttons】There are 3 buttons on the top of external speakers for laptop,which are volume up, volume down and mute button.The design of the top of the button allows you to adjust in the most convenient, effortless and intuitive way.Normal pause button can only pause the sound of music software, but not stop the video and other sounds. So when you urgently need to stop playing sound, just press the mute button and you can do your things without worry

【Wider Compatibility】Our Pc speaker for desktop with the latest built-in decoder chip are compatible with Laptops,Pc and some android Phones with type-C port, as long as they have the latest audio drivers installed for the sound card. USB C to USB Adapter in the box will make the speaker work well with Type-C port only devices like Samsung phones,Macbook Air,Pro,Huawei phones or other devices. More Compatible than other speakers with only USB cable

【Perfect after-sales service】1-Years manufacturer's warranty, 2 months unconditional refund. Please trust our after-sales team, we do our best to make you feel the best service. If you have any questions, please check the manual or the box to contact us, we have a professional team to solve your problems within 12 hours. Contact us please when you are not satisfied with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fidelity from this usb speaker
reviews.reviewText: I needed a speaker. I have already had 3 Bluetooth speakers die over the last several years, so I opted for a wired speaker. It’s plug-and-play! Great fidelity and plenty of volume. I use it for my frequent videoconferences, much better sound than my laptop. Oh, and no external power supply needed, totally runs off the usb cable. Good price point as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent PC speaker
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for a desktop PC speaker for a gaming computer-turned into every day computer. Went to Amazon's "Delivered the next day" tab and this speaker was one of many I searched. Since the overall rating was one of the best I chose one of these Votntut speakers.After almost 2 days using this speaker is a great addition to my computer set-up. I was unaware that a speaker could be plugged in using a USB but it works! And no additional need for an audio port plug, just USB this into the computer and you're up and running.Some features I like - 1) When turned on it stays on, unlike my bluetooth speakers that turn off after so many minutes of not using. 2) For the small size it does pretty good sound-wise. In the back of the speaker there's a woofer-type mechanism that gives you a tiny bass. 3) Although it's spherical it's small enough to where it can be placed in a cluttered area. 4) Good USB cord length. 5) Easy functions...just a simple speaker with volume controls (that you can manipulate through your computer's sound tab.The only place I'd knock this speaker down a peg is the price. At just under $12 USD, although not over the top, I do think this speaker should be priced between $6 - 10. (Prices may have been adjusted due to inflation.) I hate to be nit-picky about a few dollars but...honest review!I WOULD recommend this speaker if you're looking for something for running average sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A nice little speaker but….
reviews.reviewText: I really like this speaker. I like the volume control buttons and the mute button. It’s a nice size and the sound quality is good, but I don’t like that the sound will randomly not work. I need to unplug it from the USB port and then plug it back in to get the sound to work again. It’s a bit of nuisance especially since my USB port is on the back of my computer tower, so it’s easily accessible to unplug and plug back in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little speaker
reviews.reviewText: This a compact, small speaker the has great acoustics . Its size is perfect fit on my desk and it’s a great buy for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing speaker! Small size, Large sound! Works on Linux
reviews.reviewText: I got this speaker for using it as a computer speaker. I wanted a speaker that was smaller in size, yet had decent sound at the same time. I was thinking of the double-speakers, but found this one, and decided to try it out, based upon the user reviews.A little bit about my setup:I am running Ubuntu Linux, and using a USB Hub to plug the speaker into. The speaker works flawlessly with Linux; it does not require any driver or module support.I am SUPER impressed by this little speaker! It is plenty loud enough for me. I listen to music as well as use it for group Zoom video calls, and it works flawlessly...plenty of sound, even at 50% or less (from the max volume capability). Also, when I am using the speaker, other participants in Zoom cannot hear themselves from my webcam mic...so somehow, that all works as well.I would HIGHLY recommend this speaker. It is plug & play, and works without any drivers / modules. It is just as loud as if there were two speakers side-by-side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Major audio improvement over my factory laptop speakers
reviews.reviewText: I used to listen to videos and music using my laptop but decided an upgrade was necessary and this unit did NOT disappoint! Great product, not too light or heavy, not too big or small, and easy volume controls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My hearing is not the best. My computer has the volume of a distant whisper. This speaker allows me to hear audio books across my old farmhouse kitchen. It simply plugs into the computer port no setup necessary. The volume controls are well marked and easily accessed . So far it has been a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good sound, and value
reviews.reviewText: Good sound and does not take up much space.
